metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13755 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In The Sleuth Kit (TSK) 4.4.2, opening a crafted ISO 9660 image triggers anout-of-bounds read in iso9660_proc_dir() in tsk/fs/iso9660_dent.c inlibtskfs.a, as demonstrated by fls.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13755` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtsk13 - 4.4.2-3
sleuthkit - 4.4.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.2-3').
